task.title: Use a Setup Wizard
task.shortdesc: From the New Drawing dialog box, you can select "Use a SetupWizard" tab to create a new drawing by the wizard. There are two wizard options illuminated as follows:

ul.li:
Advanced Setup Wizard
From this option, you can set units of measurement, the precision of displayed units, and grid limits. Also specify angle settings such as units of measurement style, precision, direction, and orientation based on template zwcadiso.dwt.

context.p: From this option, you can specify units of measurement, the precision of displayed units, and grid limits based on template zwcadiso.dwt.
To begin a new drawing using a wizard

step.cmd: On the File menu, click New.
In the New Drawing dialog box, click Use a Setup Wizard.
Click Quick SetupWizard or Advanced Setup Wizard.
Complete the wizardpages using the Next and Back buttons to move forward and backward.
On the last page, click Finish.
